related_post.text: Guys i have a trouble...\\> i want to create ansible script to deploy my RPI cluster.\\> my ansible playbook (`.yml`) is full of `jinja2` templates which make it look awful... + Templates not always work as expected(most notably when i want to create an list/dict but `jinja2` crashes and returns a string with a `.yml` code that represents/encodes a list/dict object i wanted does not creates the object just returns a raw string which passed into a `.yml` file would create an object otherwise)\\> I want to create a custom ansible filter that will take a multiline string containing a python code.Can someone please tell me how to execute python code from a string?
